result.arabic_text: فَأَجۡمِعُواْ كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱئۡتُواْ صَفّٗاۚ وَقَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَعۡلَىٰ
result.translation: Nimwegeranye rero inguvu z’urwenge rwanyu, hanyuma mwunge urunani rw’intamenwa, muze muri umugwi umwe, muheze mutererere hasi rimwe ibikoresho vy’ubukonikoni mufise mu minwe, kandi kuri uno musi uwushika ku ntsinzi, ni uwunesha uwundi”.
